name: Dark ProtonMail by Mew
description: A work in progress, dark theme for ProtonMail. Open for testing.

user.name: Vednoc
user.about: Hi! I am Vednoc, but people mostly call me Mew. Making website themes is one of the things that I absolutely love doing, so I decided to share them with the world.

additional_info:
18th of August: Not as much progress as I would've hoped for because of some IRL things going on, but the development is on! Slowly shaping and polishing everything; keep your eyes out for new updates. :)
11th of August: Currently there's not much to it, but the core functionality is in place. It'll be more refined within the next week or two.

discussions.name: Awesome! Just could use a little improvement
